title: Randi Rhodes Show with Nicole Sandler - November 27 2013
description:

As if to counter the new pope with a healthy dose of American ignorance and bigotry, the Supreme Court has agreed to decide whether or not corporate personhood extends to having the Ã¢â‚¬Ëœreligious freedomÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ to ignore labor law, and the rightwing Catholic League has launched a crusade against Bill Maher over comments made by gay advocate Dan Savage... plus a ridiculous list of other utterances that have gotten their collective panties in a wad.

Meanwhile, organizers expect about 1,500 Black Friday Walmart protests across the country this year, the IRS eyes limiting the role of political nonprofits, Lara LoganÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s bogus Benghazi story earns her a timeout, and Alec Baldwin sounds off about parting company with MSNBC.
